name: Storage Container
specification: Plastic container, translucent with airtight lid; available in sizes ranging from 1 to 10 liters; durable and lightweight.
function: Safely stores medical equipment, supplies, and materials to protect them from contamination and damage.
usage: Label contents clearly; close lid securely; store containers in designated storage areas to maintain order and accessibility.
maintenance: Wash inside and outside surfaces regularly with mild detergent; dry thoroughly before reuse to prevent mold and contamination.
warning: Using unlabeled containers can cause confusion; cracked or damaged containers may leak or lead to contamination of contents.
